MemberSignature.Value: public void Complete ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Complete() cil managed
Public Sub Complete ()
public: virtual void Complete();

summary.span: 通知 ，告知其不应该生成任何更多的消息也不应使用任何更多的延迟消息。

span.span: Signals to the that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后已在数据流块上调用，将完成该块，并将其任务将进入最终状态之后它已处理所有以前可用的数据。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its task will enter a final state after it has processed all previously available data. 将不会阻止等待完成发生，而是将发起的请求; 但要等待的时间完成，发生，可能使用任务。 will not block waiting for completion to occur, but rather will initiate the request; to wait for completion to occur, the task may be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion { get; }
.property instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion
Public ReadOnly Property Completion As Task
public: property System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ Completion { System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 ，其表示数据流块的操作和完成。

span.span: Gets a that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.
The task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据流块视为已完成时它当前不在处理一条消息，当它具有保证不会处理更多消息。A dataflow block is considered completed when it is not currently processing a message and when it has guaranteed that it will not process any more messages. 返回关联的块完成时将转换为已完成状态。The returned will transition to a completed state when the associated block has completed. 它将转换为状态在阻塞完成其处理成功根据数据流块时定义的语义。It will transition to the state when the block completes its processing successfully according to the dataflow block’s defined semantics. 它将转换为状态在数据流块已完成处理过早地由于未经处理的异常，并且它将转换为时数据流块已完成的状态由于正在接收取消请求过早地处理。It will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to an unhandled exception, and it will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to receiving a cancellation request. 如果任务在完成时处于状态，其`Exception`属性将返回包含导致失败的块的一个或多个异常。If the task completes in the state, its `Exception` property will return an containing the one or more exceptions that caused the block to fail.

public: property int InputCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取等待被此代码块处理的输入项的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of input items waiting to be processed by this block.
The number of input items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不包括任何当前正在处理的块或已处理的块的任何项的项。The does not include any items currently being processed by the block or any items that have already been processed by the block.

span.span: Causes the to complete in a state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后已在数据流块上调用，将完成该块，并将其任务将进入最终状态。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its task will enter a final state. 出错块，作为与取消块，导致缓冲的消息 （未处理的输入的消息，以及 unoffered 的输出消息） 会丢失。Faulting a block, as with canceling a block, causes buffered messages (unprocessed input messages as well as unoffered output messages) to be lost.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅实例链接到此实例可能使用，并且仅必须用于保留实例以前提供的此源到目标。Only instances linked to this instance may use , and it must only be used to reserve instances previously offered by this source to the target. 如果`true`返回，必须随后调用或此消息。If `true` is returned, the must subsequently call either or for this message. 如果不这样做可能会导致无法进行任何进一步将消息传播到此或其他目标的源。Failure to do so may result in the source being unable to propagate any further messages to this or other targets. 不得调用，而目标还保持任何内部锁。 must not be called while the target is holding any internal locks. 这样将违反锁层次结构需要避免数据流网络中的死锁。Doing so will violate the lock hierarchy necessary to avoid deadlocks in a dataflow network.

summary.span: 向 提供消息，向目标提供使用和延迟消息的机会。

span.span: Offers a message to the , giving the target the opportunity to consume or postpone the message.
The status of the offered message.

returns.span: 如果目标接受该消息，则将返回 ，并且源不应再使用提供的消息，因为它现在归目标所有。

span.span: If the message was accepted by the target, is returned, and the source should no longer use the offered message, as it is now owned by the target.

returns.span: 如果消息因该目标延迟，则将以通知的形式返回 ，该通知是目标稍后可能会尝试使用或保留消息的通知；同时，源仍拥有消息并将其提供给其他块。

span.span: If the message was postponed by the target, is returned as a notification that the target may later attempt to consume or reserve the message; in the meantime, the source still owns the message and may offer it to other blocks.

returns.span: 如果目标被推迟，但源为 ，则返回 。

span.span: If the target would have otherwise postponed but source was , is instead returned.

returns.span: 如果尝试了接受此则消息但由于将消息交付给另一目标或放弃该消息的源而错过该消息，则将返回 。

span.span: If the target tried to accept the message but missed it due to the source delivering the message to another target or simply discarding it, is returned.

returns.span: 如果目标选择不接受消息，则将返回 。

span.span: If the target chose not to accept the message, is returned.

returns.span: 如果源选择不接受该消息并将从不从此源接受另一则消息，则将返回 。

span.span: If the target chose not to accept the message and will never accept another message from this source, is returned.
The is not valid.
